title: What CGPA IS REQUIRED FOR MASTERS IN US?
content:
I want to ask 3 questions please help me out.

1. Is it hard to score high cgpa in pes?. 
2. What cgpa is easy to score in PES?.
3. What cgpa is required for masters in US. (I want to do btech cs)
4. Does extracurriculars like club activities, hackathons matter for us masters

comments.body:
1. Not straightforward, but not that difficult if you put in consistent hard work. Quite a few people cross 9+.

2. Very subjective, but I'd say maybe 7.5+ is easy, almost no effort. 8+ is minimum effort.

3. Ideally as high as possible. 9+ is a safe bet. Also If you are yet to do BTech why is this a question now.

4. A tiny bit yes, but not too much either. Primarily its academics + relevant work/research experiences that help. Awards/recognitions are relevant only if they are at a large scale (national or higher).
What cgpa is needed for masters in us
